item.content:encoded:
I have 6 years of professional web development experience working with PHP, JavaScript/jQuery, Ajax, HTML5, CSS3, and MYSQL. I’ve developed a great deal of custom work for projects in custom wordpress themes & plugins, extensions and customizing shopify themes.

I will work with you to create your dream, solve your problem, or simply get the project done in a timely manner

The post Jasmeet Kaur appeared first on Media Shop Canada.

item.title: Abhijeet Singh
item.dc:creator: Lalit Kumar
item.description:
Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry.

The post Abhijeet Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
item.content:encoded:
I am a full time expert Web-Designer/Developer. I can perform both front-end and back-end responsibilities. I have developed and maintained websites using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (jQuery), PHP, MYSQL. I do have experience with many CMS like WordPress,Thinkific,Squparespace,Shopify etc I can completely handle designing/developing complete dynamic websites from design to deployment.

I always work with my clients with a motive to work on long term basis and provide excellent after sales service. I am proactive when it comes to work and believe in over-delivering for my clients. I will give you long term service and maintain a healthy, fruitful work relationship with you.

The post Abhijeet Singh appeared first on Media Shop Canada.
